title: Doom Has Come for Nvidia’s Graphics Cards, After All
full_text: Doom Has Come for Nvidia’s Graphics Cards, After All. The latest RTX 50-series is hundreds or thousands of dollars more expensive than at launch.. Unless you long to witness the demise of accessible PC gaming, I wouldnt check Amazon for any Nvidia graphics card right now. Just in the past month, prices on the companys coveted GPUs have skyrocke… [+4903 chars]
